review_title: I was responcible for PR and social marketing in the Foundation, part time, from 8 to 12 a.m.
pros: Fantastic team, working with children with specual needs, very devoted team, great experts, very comfatrable job invironment!
cons: There is no cons, it's a very challenging to work for Karin Dom if the caouse of children with special needs is your cause.
